TEXT.S: Htuw beh kawas 1924 byacing 2 ryax 2, wan mhoqin sa kawas 2007 byacing 3 ryax 24 83 kawas ryax'nqyanux. hiya' ga smimun hayyo na p'ega ruw miru sa pinqzyuwan na zyuwaw ruw sinmung pgiki'. aring beh 5 kawas niya lga musa tmwang kya Alpaniya' qutux ngasai nha la. ktan nha' beh ana ega' inu' kryax hiya', ruw geki'ing na kokka' na Alpaniya. ryax niya pgeki' ga beh kawas 1945 ruw pucing beh kawas 1994. wan nha' syun beh pyang hopa' balay lalu na (People's Artist beh Alpaniya') lalu' niya.
